name: Larry Nguyen
about: A dedicated and results-oriented professional specializing in blockchain, NFTs, and Web3‚Ä¶

people_also_viewed.about: Wordpress Developer at NAMTECH CONSULTING LTD

recommendations: Minh Ngo ‚ÄúMr. Larry has an extensive network that spans traditional and blockchain industries. He is excellent at building new relationships and maintaining existing ones. His ability to connect with people and create a positive impression is undeniable. I have learned a great deal from him in this regard. One of Mr. Larry's strengths is his ability to create a supportive environment for team members. He encourages us to explore our full potential and freely express ourselves as long as we fulfill the tasks assigned. However, he is always willing to provide guidance and direction when needed. I appreciate his willingness to offer advice and instruction, which has helped me develop professionally. As someone who used to be a CMO of a venture, Mr. Larry is highly knowledgeable in blockchain, finance, and marketing. He is someone I often seek advice from to get a different perspective on a project or matter. His experience and expertise have helped me understand different aspects of these areas and improved my decision-making skills.‚Äù
projects: [{"title":"WordPress - B&F Image Comparison plugin","start_date":"Aug 2016","description":"B&F Image Comparison plugin allows you to create the effect of comparing the two images before and after.The plugin contains the following features:Set width.Set heightHover effectEasy to use with shortcodeShortcode:[compare before=\"http://domain.com/imagename1.jpg\" after=\"http://domain.com/imagename2.jpg\" width=\"600px\" height=\"400px\"]"},{"title":"WordPress - Woocommerce Hide Add To Cart Button","start_date":"Aug 2016","description":"The plugin could help to hide \"Add to Cart\" button for one or more Woocommerce products.It will :- Hide Add to Cart button from product single page.- Hide Add to Cart button from category page.- Hide Add to Cart button from homepage and all other pages.You can set the \"expiry date\" and the \"Add to cart\" button will come back afer that date.Tags: Hide Add To Cart Button, hide add to cart woocommerce, woocommerce"},{"title":"4News - WordPress theme","start_date":"Feb 2016"},{"title":"Shoffee Coffee & Restaurant WordPress theme","start_date":"Dec 2015"},{"title":"Fashion Loudge - WordPress Theme","start_date":"May 2015","description":"Fashion Loudge is a New Ultimate Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme with elegant and clear design. Besides it suits for any type of design fashion shop, blog, handmade, studio, portfolio, personal website, business etc.. Here are some features of our themeClean, modern, multi-purpose design can be used for any type of websiteWordPress 4.1 Tested and ApprovedBuilt with HTML5 and CSS3Well organized, commented & clean codeSEO Optimized ( also compatible with SEO Plugins )Cross-Browser Compatibility: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE9 ~ IE11100% Responsive ThemeComes with the Visual Composer, most awesome visual page builder for WordPressRetina Ready, Ultra-High Resolution GraphicsAll Themes Icons are font icons ( more than 10000 icons included )Awesome CSS3 animations for every modulesChild Theme Compatible ‚Äì includes basic child themeStrong focus on design and typography, usability and overall user-experience.Jquery Enhancements"}]
